name: Half-city
description:
The city of Sophronia is made up of two cities. One of the half-cities is permanent, the other is temporary. A sketch for a 4-day-sprint, inspired by "Sophronia" in Italo Calvino's Invisible Cities. 

Music: Vexations, by Erik Satie.

All assets modeled by me, except for the horses in the carousel.
